text: The New Zealand Herald is a daily newspaper published in Auckland, New Zealand. It is the most printed and sold newspaper in New Zealand. It peaked at over 200,000 copies daily in 2006. The newspaper was founded in 1863. The current editor is Murray Kirkness. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1863 establishments Category:Newspapers published in New Zealand Category:1860s establishments in New Zealand
title: The New Zealand Herald
